desc:
This massive purple creature, with legs like tree trunks and a pair of enormous arms, shakes the ground with its footsteps. Its eyeless head is bulbous, with an elongated mouth that is almost snout-like._  
**Allies of the Ghasts of Leng.** The kaveph are massive creatures that originate from the lightless underground of the  
**Plateau of Leng.** They are usually found in the company of the Open Game License
name: Kaveph
senses: blindsight 90 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 10

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The kaveph makes two smash attacks.

actions.name: Smash
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away from the kaveph.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

reactions.name: Revenge
reactions.desc: When a kaveph is dealt 20 damage or more by a single attack and survives, it can make a smash attack against the attacker.

special_abilities.name: Rampage
special_abilities.desc: When the kaveph reduces a creature to 0 hp with a melee attack on its turn, it can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a smash attack.
